tips.wear: Protip: To wear a skin, tap and hold its icon!

confirm.title: Korvataanko Skini?
confirm.message: Do you really want to replace your skin with "%s"?

error.title: Lataus virhe
error.login: Minecraft.net ei voi kirjautua. Tarkista käyttäjätunnus ja salasana asetukset.
error.server: Ei päässyt minecraft.net. Sivusto voi olla alas. Tarkista http://help.mojang.com ja yritä myöhemmin uudelleen.
error.upload: Skiniä ei voitu ladata minecraft.net. Yritä myöhemmin uudelleen.
error.challenge: Tarvitset turvallisuus kysymykseen tiliäsi laitteesta. Valitettavasti ei voinut ladata se. Tarkista yhteys ja yritä myöhemmin uudelleen.

footer.migratedAccount: If your account has been migrated to a Mojang account, you have to use your email address instead of your Minecraft username.
footer.privacy: Note: we will NEVER store or use any of your informations for anything else than switching your Minecraft skins. Your account info is stored securely in the iOS keychain.

urlSelect.urlTitle: Paste or type the skin URL here (must be a PNG file):
urlSelect.invalidUrl: Tämä URL-osoite ei kelpaa (täytyy olla PNG-tiedosto).

error.network: Couldn't load your search results. Check your connexion, and retry later.

error.skin: Error while downloading the skin. Aborting.

preview.title: Network Error
preview.message: Error while downloading the preview. There will be no preview for this skin. Continue anyway?

challenge.title: Identity Confirmation
challenge.help:
You need to answer this question because you are trying to access your Mojang account from a different location.

If you forgot the answer, you can try answering another question by closing this window and trying again (it's random).

If you really can't remember, please visit help.mojang.com for instructions on resetting your questions.

restoreDatabase.title: Uh oh...
restoreDatabase.message:
We were unable to open the file containing your skins, for some reason.
Fortunately, there's a backup from %s.
Would you like to restore it?
